column6: Peter Parker: Paparazzi! Part 1 of 3 The DB, New York's trashiest tabloid, has just hired the sleaziest paparazzi of them all...PETER PARKER?!  And the first ever livestreaming super-villain: Screwball!
column8: | artist:Marcos Martin | penciller (cover):Ed McGuinness | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Javier Rodriguez | writer:Dan Slott
